issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Add hint to enforce semi join optimization

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Currently the semi join hints can be used to create only one semi join optimization per alias which is very limiting.
fields.summary: Semijoin Hint : Should be able to handle more than one hint per alias

comments.body:
Initial patch. Go to RB for details at,
https://reviews.apache.org/r/59080/

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12867061/HIVE-16610.1.patch
